Effects of Praising and Scolding...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Effects of Praising and Scolding...
By megaman4 on Tuesday, June 9, 2009 - 07:40 pm:

I just got MR2 and I was exploring all the archives for what I need to know, such as various breeding methods, how much resting reduces fatigue and stress, etc. But anyways I didn't seem to find anything on how much stress, fatigue, and nature praising and scolding reduces/raises.

Thanks.

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, June 9, 2009 - 08:06 pm:

They affect nature (good/bad) and spoil, IIRC they don't affect stress/fatigue.

By megaman4 on Tuesday, June 9, 2009 - 08:12 pm:

Thanks, can you tell me the statistics on how much they affect spoil?

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 10, 2009 - 11:32 am:

Sorry, we don't have hard numbers for it. It's an easy correction, so I don't think anyone bothered to chart it out.

By MrGG on Thursday, June 11, 2009 - 09:22 pm:

I am almost positive excessive scolding can raise stress and praise lowers it, I remember praising at every chance I got and very rarely scolded, but that may have been a mental thing. Fatigue I never noticed being effected.
